ext_description.message: The cute and funny translator that lets you easily translate Cunny Code as you browse the web.

placeholder_input.description: Placeholder texts for the input field.

placeholder_output.description: Placeholder texts for the output field.

label_password.description: Label for the password field under the input field.

btn_swap.description: Tooltip/title for the swap button. (displays on hover)

btn_copy.description: Texts for the copy button below the output field.

btn_copy_success.description: Texts for the copy button when the output is copied successfully.

btn_copy_fail.description: Texts for the copy button when the output fails to copy.

error_title.description: Title for the error window that displays when unsupported characters are encoded.

error_body.message: The following could not be encoded.
error_body.description: Texts for the error window that displays when unsupported characters are encoded.

footer_website.description: Link to the Cunny Code website in the footer.

footer_options.description: Link to the extension options in the footer.

footer_donate.description: Link to the donate page in the footer.

label_auto_translate.description: Label texts for the auto-encode/decode option.

desc_auto_translate.message: Automatically encodes or decodes Cunny Code when text is entered into the input field.

label_auto_copy.description: Label texts for the auto-copy option.

desc_auto_copy.message: Automatically copy and paste selected text into the input field when you open the popup.

label_keep_password_state.description: Label texts for the password state option.

desc_keep_password_state.message: Keeps the password checkbox ticked or unticked depending on your preference.
desc_keep_password_state.description: Description for the password state option.

desc_keep_password_state_subtext.message: (If disabled, the password checkbox defaults to off every time you open the popup.)
desc_keep_password_state_subtext.description: Additional description for the password state option.

label_save_password.description: Label texts for the save password option.

desc_save_password.message: Saves your most recent password so you don't have to type it again when encrypting or decrypting.
desc_save_password.description: Description for the save password option.

desc_save_password_subtext.message: (The saved password is deleted upon disabling this option.)
desc_save_password_subtext.description: Additional description for the save password option.

label_context_menu.description: Label texts for the context menu option.

desc_context_menu.message: Shows Cunny Translate in the context menu whenever you right click while text is selected.

desc_context_menu_subtext.message: (Changing this option will reload the extension and close this page temporarily.)
desc_context_menu_subtext.description: Additional description for the context menu option.

btn_reset.description: Texts for the options reset button.

reset_prompt.message: This will reset the options to their defaults and reload the extension. Do you want to continue?
reset_prompt.description: Prompt that displays when the reset options button is clicked.

link_homepage.description: Texts for the Cunny Code homepage link at the bottom of the options page.

arona_dialogue_1.description: First line for Arona's dialogue on the options page.

arona_dialogue_2.message: You can change the options for Cunny Translate on this page.
arona_dialogue_2.description: Second line for Arona's dialogue on the options page.
